ai-ja258:1.1_0: “A galaxy extends a thousand times as far
ai-ja258:1.3_0: she was consultorted by all the slaves,
ai-ja258:2.1_0: Not by a rain of coins,
ai-ja258:2.2_0: it is found among sense pleasures:
ai-ja258:2.3_0: sense desires are poorly given up,
ai-ja258:2.4_0: these four friends for what they are
ai-ja258:3.3_0: A disciple of the fully awakened Buddha
ai-ja258:3.4_0: a disciple of the fully awakened Buddha.”
